translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「またフルの影響でそういうカラーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, due to the influence of Full, such colors

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頻出する時期でもあり、秩序は崩壊する寸前」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were frequently appearing during this time, and order was on the verge of collapse."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その為の精液奴隷との接触の禁止、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For that, contact with semen slaves was prohibited,
and sexual intercourse was strictly forbidden."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも一割は悔しいからだったんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But ten percent of it was because it was frustrating, wasn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの女王となる責務を与えられた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was given the duty to become the Queen of Color."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、母があのフル・カラー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And my mother was that Full Color.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰よりも強く己を律し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was stricter with herself than anyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分にも他人にも厳しい女王が求められた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a queen who was harsh to both herself and others."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クソ真面目に生きてきたつまらない女が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A boring woman who lived seriously as hell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めて興味を示した娯楽すら封じられた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was even denied the entertainment she showed interest in for the first time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奔放に生きてきた母にも、
呑気に生きてきた娘にも分かるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nor my carefree daughter could understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 唯一の不良エピソード」
生前の念願が叶ったことになる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have had my lifelong wish fulfilled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 掟のおかげでビビッドやモダンちゃんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thanks to the laws, I was able to get the virgins Vivid and Modern,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 処女ゲット出来た、グッドだ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you want to do it again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前みたいにパステルの体に入るなら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you want to enter Pastel's body like before,
I'll do it as many times as you want."
"Mm, I will keep that in mind."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビビッドがちょいちょいとランスを手招きする。
ビビッドの小さい顔がランスの耳元に口を寄せて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Vivid’s small face leaned toward Lance’s ear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽそぽそと喋りだした。
「今した話のように、歴代の女王も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Like the story we just told, the past queens

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 案外適当にやっている面もある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have surprisingly done things rather loosely in some aspects."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり四角四面に気張りすぎるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: don’t be too rigid and uptight..."
"That's what I want you to convey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今聞いたように、歴代女王も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you just heard, the queens of the past

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構適当にやってきたようだしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seem to have taken a rather casual approach."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前もあまり気張りすぎず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You too shouldn’t push yourself too hard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力を抜くところは力を抜いてやった方がいいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it’s better to relax where you can."
"That’s what Vivid told me to say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ま、それが言いたかっただけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, that was all I wanted to say."

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
